trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee queen can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee queen can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

trait.name: Necrotic Aura
entries: At the start of each of the banshee queen's turns, each creature within 15 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. A creature that touches the banshee queen or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the banshee queen fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The banshee queen makes two corrupting touch attacks.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) necrotic damage. A successful hit will also age the target 2d4 years. This can only be revsered by a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee queen that can see her must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee queen is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee queen's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Tormenting Wail {@recharge 5}
entries: The banshee queen releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of its next three turns. If a creature succeeds at any point, the effects of the wail end.
On the first failure, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and is stunned until the effect ends.
On the second failure, it falls prone and takes 20 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.
On the third failure, it drops to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: The banshee queen makes a corrupting touch attack

legendary.name: Move
entries: The banshee queen moves without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Invoke fear
entries: The banshee queen targets a single creatue and projects a phantasmal nightmare of that creatures own death upon them. The creature must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. If the target can see her, it must use the dash action to move away from the banshee queen on its turn. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
